name: Send a PandaDoc offer letter or rejection Email (+add applicant to Mailchimp) from an updated Airtable record
description:
The template works with the following [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shruEPIPJZVXf2tAY). The scenario is triggered when the 'Final status' field is updated. To achieve that, we created the 'Last modified 2' field of type 'Last modified time' and chose to watch updates in the 'Final status' field only.

Use this template to automatically send a PandaDoc offer letter to accepted job applicants and an Email message to rejected applicants (and add them to Mailchimp as subscribers).
